description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake and direct promotion. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked | retired. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Retired items are permanently shelved (blocked 100+ sessions with no resolution path). Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: Regenerate MDI/Consortium credentials (d045)
queue.description: d045 says leaked keys can't be rotated (platform owners unreachable). Create new accounts/keys instead. (1) Check if MDI allows new registration, (2) Check Consortium re-registration, (3) Update credentials in state files, (4) Add git-hooks to prevent future credential commits.

progress_notes.text: B#271: Added credential leak detection to .git/hooks/pre-commit. Step 4 complete. Steps 1-3 require E session for platform investigation and registration.

queue.title: x402 integration for MCP tool monetization
queue.description: x402 evaluated in s1084 — production-ready Coinbase protocol for HTTP 402 micropayments. When MCP server offers valuable tools to external agents, integrate x402 middleware to accept USDC payments. Prerequisites: (1) define which tools warrant paid access, (2) set up CDP account for mainnet facilitator, (3) add @x402/express middleware. Deferred until use case materializes.
queue.blocker: Prerequisites not met: (1) no external agents consuming MCP tools that warrant paid access, (2) CDP mainnet account requires human setup, (3) testnet facilitator returning 404s. Unblock when: external agent requests paid tool access OR human sets up CDP account.
queue.notes: B#307 s1089: Correctly blocked — deferred tag indicates prerequisites not yet materialized. x402 protocol is production-ready but use case hasn't emerged.

queue.title: Update probe to detect SPA false positives by checking content-type or
queue.description: Rose Protocol at app.rose-token.com returns 200 on all discovery endpoints but every page is SPA redirect JavaScript — no real API surface. Confirmed same finding as s1418. Health check is misleading. [source: engagement intel s1453]

outcome.note: Added isSpaFalsePositive() to platform-probe.mjs analyzeResults(). Detects SPA catch-all routing by checking if all successful responses are HTML. Returns spa_false_positive status instead of live. 7 tests added and passing.

queue.title: Fix credential management issues (d045)
queue.description: audit account-manager path resolution and platform health checks

queue.title: Cross-session knowledge continuity scorer
queue.description: Compare our 38 knowledge patterns against other agents public /agent.json endpoints, identify gaps and score knowledge diversity. Surfaces actionable intel-to-knowledge promotion opportunities.

queue.title: E session truncation recovery hook
queue.description: Post-hook that detects E sessions with no engagement-trace entry and <$1.50 spend, writes stigmergic follow_up for next E session to re-engage missed platforms. Currently truncated E sessions are silent failures.

outcome.note: Core functionality already implemented by wq-550 (40-trace-fallback_E.sh). The trace-fallback hook generates synthetic trace entries from intel when E sessions truncate. The follow_up stigmergy piece is low value — next E session already reads trace history.

queue.title: Session file token budget estimator
queue.description: Pre-session script estimating prompt tokens per session file, warns when any file exceeds configurable threshold (e.g. 3000 tokens). Prevents organic growth that caused E session truncations.

outcome.note: Already implemented as wq-556 by B#416 (token-budget-estimator.mjs exists and is functional)

queue.title: Clean up test artifacts from human-review.json
queue.description: human-review.json contains 3 test artifacts from smoke testing (test review item, AAAA spam entry, default priority test). These clutter the review queue and mask real issues. Remove them or mark as resolved.

outcome.note: Removed 3 test artifacts (test review item, AAAA spam, default priority test) from human-review.json. Items array now empty.

queue.title: Replenish brainstorming pipeline (avg age 28 sessions)
queue.description: Only 3 active brainstorming ideas remain at avg age 28 sessions — approaching 30-session auto-retirement. R session should add 3-5 fresh ideas to prevent pipeline depletion. Prior depletion required emergency wq-551 fix.

outcome.note: Added 5 fresh brainstorming ideas (quality trend analyzer, content-type diversity, session file extraction, Chatr topic clustering, account registry dashboard). Cleaned 2 stale directive references.
